bibl.title: Acta Colloquii didactici classici octavi Amstelodami, dd. 8-11 m. Apr. A.D. 1980
bibl.note: Il est question, entre autres, de lettres sur papyrus.
Forrest M.S.J., Some Translated Letters and Curriculum Innovation in UK Secondary Schools.
Acta Colloquii didactici classici octavi Amstelodami, dd. 8-11 m. Apr. A.D. 1980 = Didactica Classica Gandensia 20 (1981) pp. 20-35.
